semantic_identifier: [GOLD-182]: Sales_Accelerator v2: Ingest deal-risk context and map to Issue_Tracker issue objects
title: Sales_Accelerator v2: Ingest deal-risk context and map to Issue_Tracker issue objects

sections.text: Implement the initial integration wiring to pull deal-risk signals from Sales_Accelerator v2 and attach them to the correct Issue_Tracker issue objects (theme/root cause) via stable identifiers (account/customer + related conversations). Persist the normalized deal-risk fields (e.g., risk score, impacted deal ids, stage, ARR) on the issue context record for later priority boosting. Add basic validation and logging for missing/ambiguous mappings without changing prioritization logic yet.
